reviews.review_msg: If Dr. Sneddon has a million fans, then I am one of them. If Dr. Sneddon has ten fans, then I am one of them. If Dr. Sneddon has only one fan then that is me. If Dr. Sneddon has no fans, then that means I am no longer on earth. If the world is against Dr. Sneddon, then I am against the world.
As being dedicated into teaching, she has made the lectures very interesting!! She does care about her students and understand the challenges students may face! I would like to give her 100/100!

It's a reading-heavy course but Dr. Sneddon is passionate about the material, which is evident in how she teaches it. She tries to make the material as engaging and relatable as possible to solidify the information and provide a better understanding of the more complex topics. It's obvious she cares about her students and wants to see them succeed.

Perhaps it's the course itself, but the lectures are quite boring, and there are numerous assignments and readings. The exams emphasize the readings more than the lectures. Be cautious when she mentions things you don't need to memorize, as they can still appear on the exams. On the positive side, she is very approachable!
Very clear and logical explanations and good slides for all topics. Highly recommended!
